updates.description: 20 new cases from December 2023 to March 2024. total: 282 cases registered. Additionally, some sources and violence components have been edited. Exp: broken Telam sources have been replaced, and approximately 40 violence components of cases that were already uploaded have been edited. Creation of news.json
Update of cases. New cases were added (3), repetitions were removed (2), and others were edited. Total number of cases: 280. spell fix
